inclusion.criterion: Women at least 35 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women with suspected or confirmed pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women who have had bilateral mastectomy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women who are very frail and unable to cooperate
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject has had breast augmentation, except for unilateral augmentation done for prior mastectomy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women with physical limitations such as, but not limited to: frozen shoulder, recent heart surgery, pace maker, neck problems, or any other condition that would prohibit them from lying face down
inclusion.label: unknown
